nodes.text: Soleil Agra was a Nautolan Jedi Master who sat on the Jedi High Council during the time of the High Republic Era. Agra had yellow skin and black eyes, and wore a set of white and gold Jedi robes.
Created for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative, Soleil Agra was introduced in the fourth episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show, released on July 28, 2021.
